original_title: Bible and Homosexualty: Exegesis and Hermeneutic
overview: The bible readed through exegesis and hermeneutic don't mention any exclusion of the homosexuals, or abomination by God.  On the contrary, this movie shows reports and inclusion of homosexual couples.
tagline: bible, documentary, christian, homosexualty, homosexuals, homo
title: Bible and Homosexualty: Exegesis and Hermeneutic
